description: This file defines a class WikipediaTools that provides methods to search Wikipedia and update a knowledge base, utilizing external modules such as wikipedia, Document, WikipediaKnowledgeBase, and Toolkit.

classes.name: WikipediaTools
classes.description: A toolkit class providing methods to search Wikipedia and update a knowledge base, extending the Toolkit class.

methods.name: search_wikipedia_and_update_knowledge_base
methods.description: Searches Wikipedia for a topic, adds the results to the knowledge base, and returns the relevant documents as a JSON string.

methods.name: search_wikipedia
methods.description: Searches Wikipedia for a query and returns the summary as a JSON string.
